Beads.description: Send your heartfelt wishes with a special touch - a thoughtful gift to brighten their day and celebrate their journey with love and joy.

Choco.description: Celebrate their special day with a sweet surprise — a chocolate bouquet that wraps your warmest wishes in every bite.

Flower.description: Brighten their birthday with a beautiful flower bouquet that speaks love, joy, and heartfelt wishes without saying a word.

Doll Flower.description: A charming blend of blooms and cuddles — this doll flower bouquet is a hug wrapped in petals.
